summary: DUE TO A TRANSMISSION DESIGN FLAW, THE CAR WILL SHUDDER WHEN THE GEARS SHIFT FROM LOW TO HIGH.  THE CAR WAS DIAGNOSED AT TUTTLE CLICK FORD IN IRVINE, CA. ON 12/11/2014 AND 4/14/15.  THE TRANSMISSION OF THE CAR CONTINUES TO SHUDDER DURING MOTION ON CITY STREETS AND HIGHWAYS.  I HAVE A COPY OF EACH INVOICE FOR SUPPORTING DOCUMENTS.
